about.title: About me
about.me: I'm a developer and Systems Analysis and Development student (5th semester) at UniSenac College in Porto Alegre, RS. Currently, I'm an intern in .NET development, applying my knowledge to create efficient, high-impact technology solutions. I focus on full-stack development, always seeking best programming practices to deliver quality solutions, and I work with the following technologies:
about.me-techs: .NET Core, NodeJS, Typescript, ReactJS, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, Docker, AWS, Git and GitHub
